snippet: The anti-immigrant movement in Germany known as Pegida may be waning in the face of counterdemonstrations and increased scrutiny of its leadership.

byline.original: By ERIK OLSEN and MELISSA EDDY

lead_paragraph: The anti-immigrant movement in Germany known as Pegida may be waning in the face of counterdemonstrations and increased scrutiny of its leadership.

headline.main: Video Feature: Pegida Movement Divides Germany
